attributes.action: Ban children under the age of 16 to stay in pubs after 8pm unless the pub has a family room
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many parents seem to think it is ok to take young children into pubs which are full of drunken people, swearing and using sexual language which is unsuitable for children. These children are the future of our country and as such should have the best possible start in life. How will they learn how to be responsible adults if the only role models they have during the evenings/nights are adults who enjoy a drink and a good time at the pub. Keep pubs adult venues after 8pm.
